title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Nolan and Job
description:
Nolan and Job talk about oscillating between belief and non-belief, Vervake, Christianity, the Cross and grace.  David Bentley Hart's book "Doors of the Sea" and the problem of evil.  The Narnia series and symbolism within Lewis' books.

Jon Vervake and J.P. Marceau 1:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XccFYuTGskc

Jon Vervake and J.P. Marceau 2:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RFA5NF4MFhI&t=1s

Reading with Randos: A Grief Observed
Part 1: https://youtu.be/4omMwnttbdk
Part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t0P6vb6p-eA

Join the ConverZation here:
https://discord.gg/j8ps92H

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsD...
